data.title: The Journey Church
data.meta_description: The Journey Church is a life-giving, inclusive, multi-ethnic church in urban Harrisburg, PA, where our desire is to help people find belonging, experience the liberative spirit of Jesus, seek justice in the world and radically love our neighbors.
data.text:
At The Journey we have two services at 9 am & 11 am in person and live stream one or both services on Facebook and YouTube.

You will be greeted by our parking attendant and a greeter at the door. We have coffee, tea and hot chocolate as you enter the lobby into the worship center. On a typical sunday we have a time of worship, announcements, a sermon and a final song.

We run on Journey time, so if you are a few minutes late, don’t fret! We probably haven’t started yet.

If you are new to The Journey check out our I’m New page to learn more about what to expect, details about parking .

We are looking forward to meeting you!

At The Journey we have in-person services at 9 am & 11 am, and our 9 am live-streamed on Facebook and YouTube.

When you arrive, you will be greeted by our parking attendant and a greeter at the door. We have coffee, tea and hot chocolate as you enter the lobby into the worship center. On a typical Sunday, we have a time of worship, announcements, a sermon and a final song of worship.

We run on Journey time, so if you are a few minutes late, don’t fret! We probably haven’t started yet.

If you are new to The Journey check out our I’m New page to learn more about what to expect and details about parking .

We are looking forward to meeting you!

We have a robust Kids & Starters Ministry at both services. Our certified, qualified team under the direction of our Director of Kids & Starters, Kyra Gonzalez, has great themes and lessons each month to engage kids at every level. Our Kids Room is for ages K-5 and our Starters Room is for infants to Pre-K. A Kid’s Team Member will be at the Kid’s Wing to help you check-in and get your kid settled in. Check-in starts at 8:50 am and 10:50 am every Sunday.

If you have a little one but would like to keep them during the service, we welcome all kids and babies in our Worship Center as well. Our Gathering Place is a great place to watch our YouTube live stream as a secondary option for families who might need more room to run around.

We value that our church attendees come and worship as they can and are able.

We also value raising up new leaders in our church to support and lead our Sunday morning worship experience! We encourage those who have been with us to consider serving on one of our many Sunday morning teams.

There is something for everyone’s gifting and abilities.
